name: codeceptjs-appium
description: Generates test scripts for CodeceptJS with Appium
install: npm install -g mocha mocha-multi codeceptjs appium && npm init --yes && npm install --save-dev codeceptjs-dbhelper database-js database-js-json && echo PLEASE RUN THE FOLLOWING COMMAND FOR SUPPORTING OTHER DATABASES && echo npm install --save-dev database-js-csv database-js-xlsx database-js-ini database-js-firebase database-js-mysql database-js-postgres database-js-sqlite
uninstall: npm uninstall -g mocha mocha-multi codeceptjs appium && npm uninstall --save-dev codeceptjs-dbhelper database-js database-js-json && echo PLEASE RUN THE FOLLOWING COMMAND FOR UNINSTALLING THE SUPPORT TO OTHER DATABASES && echo npm install --save-dev database-js-csv database-js-xlsx database-js-ini database-js-firebase database-js-mysql database-js-postgres database-js-sqlite
